captions.text:
Hi, how are you?
I'm the Otário (Sucker).

And do you know what I'll
do with this here?
Yeah!
I will apply in Hiperfundo Bradesco (Investment Fund)!
I'm so smart, huh?
After all, my money will earn the CDI (Brazilian Interest Rates)

And I can win cars
and multiple home theathers every day!

The Top Model Ana Hickmann is the poster girl of the Fund!
Wow, she is so pretty!

And best of all, my money will be safe
in the largest private bank in Brazil!
BRADESCO!
This is not bullshit, NO!
Well .. it's not like this way...

It's best you be more careful and not
accept any bullshit that they say to you!
The Hiperfundo Bradesco is one of the largest funds in Brazil!
It has a net asset of nearly 3 billion dollars!

It raffle off cars and hometheathers...
several times a week!
Wow!
Like it?! But there's more!
They do not charge of performance fee!

Woooowwwwww that's cool!
[Chorus]
Now get this!

Do you know how much these fuckers
charge of administration fee?
4.5% per year!
Do you have any idea of what does it means?!
I'll try to explain in a very practical way:

GIVE TO ME, GIVE THE MONEY!
You lost asshole!
That's what they do.
This is a truly armed robbery!

The fee usually charged by
investment funds in Brazil is 2% per year
Which is a robbery!

But those motherfuckers from Bradesco,
charge 4.5% per year?!

That is, they earn about half million dollars every day...
to do absolutely nothing!

They can barely make the money revenue be like 
60% of CDI!
What the fuck is an Administration like this?!
Are you fucking kidding me?!

If I knew that the revenue will be like this shit
I would leave in the saving account, damn it!
Because there, there is no taxes...
there is no Management Fee and it's guaranteed by the Brazilian Fund Credit (FGC)

That's why they make sweepstakes
of cars, televisions ...
It's all to fool you!
Because with the value of this management fee ...

They would not just raffle off one car a day!
They would raffle off 30 cars every day!
It goes like this:
Bradesco!

You fuck me with these rates that I am 
required to pay to have my account there.

As if you guys were doing a favor for me.
And not the other way!
You fuck with me with this awful consumer service that you guys have!

You guys fuck me with these pre-historic ATMs, 
that are a truely trash cans!

You guys fuck with me with this shit Internet Banking.
That barely works!

Now you guys are trying to fuck me with
this Fuckers Fund?!
Fuck you, motherfuckers!

I have a suggestion!
Let's do a swap!

Why don't you guys charge a 
Performance Fee of 20% per year.
Over what exceeds the CDI.
And puts an Administration Fee of 0% per year?

There is no need to raffle off anything!
Stop with these raffle off!
Well, do you guys accept the proposal?!
If you guys were really good administrators, you would accept!
No, huh? Bunch of Fuckers!
Stop fooling the people, you sons of bitches!
Oh, and there's more!
If you put your money on this shit!

Be aware that if these fuckers from Bradesco
make any mistake!

There is no FGC for your
Money, you'll get fucked!

Take care of your money...
Search other investment options!

But if you believe in Santa Claus,
Saci Perere, Easter Bunny...

Perhaps the Bradesco Hiperfundo
is a good choice for you!

Did you liked it? So, share it!
Subscribe!

And, most importantly, do not put
your money in this shit!

Or in any other bank that wants to fuck you.
[Drawing the symbol of Itaú Bank]
